title: HugsLib for 1.0 testing branch
description:
This is the latest version of HugsLib for the testing branch of Rimworld (1.0).
Once 1.0 is officially released, the main HugsLib workshop item will be updated to this version.

The latest version of HugsLib for Rimworld B18 can be found here: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=818773962]link[/url]
